verses.roman:
ājñā deha, avaśya āmi dakṣiṇe caliba
tomāra ājñāte sukhe leuṭi' āsiba'

synonyms: ājñā deha—please give permission; avaśya—certainly; āmi—I; dakṣiṇe—in South India; caliba—shall go; tomāra—your; ājñāte—by the order; sukhe—in happiness; leuṭi'-returning; āsiba—I shall come.
translation: "Please permit Me to go, for I must tour South India. With your permission, I shall soon return very happily."
